scripts.serve: cd data-explorer && npm run serve && cd ..
scripts.build: cd data-explorer && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.test:unit: cd data-explorer && npm run test:unit && cd ..
scripts.firebase: cd functions && npm run serve && cd ..
scripts.install-deps: npm install . && cd functions && npm install . && cd ../data-explorer && npm install . && cd .. && npm audit fix
scripts.web-dev: cd data-explorer && npm run dev && cd ..
